languages.text: {n}Взгляд гиганта теплеет.{/n} "Фенрис — это дом. Суровый край суровых зим и суровых людей. Когда приходит Хельвинтр, страшное время холодов, непокорное Мировое море замерзает и на охоту выходят великие белые медведи, снежные вирмы и ледяные тролли. Затем убийственный мороз отступает, и лодки гарпунщиков выходят на промысел, схватываясь с морскими змеями и кракенами".

{n}The giant's gaze thaws.{/n} "Fenris is home. A harsh land of harsh winters and harsh people. When comes the Helwinter, a fearsome season of frosts, the merciless Worldsea freezes and great white bears, snow wyrms, and ice trolls go on the hunt. Then the murderous frost retreats, and boats of harpooners sail out to ply their craft, capturing sea snakes and krakens."
languages.original_text: {n}Взгляд гиганта теплеет.{/n} "Фенрис — это дом. Суровый край суровых зим и суровых людей. Затем убийственный мороз отступает, и лодки гарпунщиков выходят на промысел, схватываясь с морскими змеями и кракенами".

languages.text: {n}这位巨人的目光变得缓和。{/n}“芬里斯是我的故乡。那是片严酷的土地，有着严酷的冬季，生活着严酷的人们。当可怕的赫尔之冬到来时，无情的世界之海就会结冰。巨型白熊、冰雪妖龙与冰霜巨魔就会冒出来，开始狩猎。在那之后，致命的霜冻会褪去，捕鱼人会驾着他们的战船出海，狩猎海蛇与海怪。”
languages.original_text: {n}The giant's gaze thaws.{/n} "Fenris is home. A harsh land of harsh winters and harsh people. When comes the Helwinter, a fearsome season of frosts, the merciless Worldsea freezes and great white bears, snow wyrms, and ice trolls go on the hunt. Then the murderous frost retreats, and boats of harpooners sail out to ply their craft, capturing sea snakes and krakens."

traits.locale_text: {n}这位巨人的目光变得缓和。{/n}“芬里斯是我的故乡。那是片严酷的土地，有着严酷的冬季，生活着严酷的人们。当可怕的赫尔之冬到来时，无情的世界之海就会结冰。巨型白熊、冰雪妖龙与冰霜巨魔就会冒出来，开始狩猎。在那之后，致命的霜冻会褪去，捕鱼人会驾着他们的战船出海，狩猎海蛇与海怪。”

languages.text: {n}La mirada del gigante se deshiela.{/n} «Fenris es mi hogar. Una tierra dura, con inviernos brutales y gente capaz de hacerles frente. Cuando llega el Invierno de Hela, el Mar del Mundo se congela y los grandes osos polares, las sierpes de las nieves y los trolls de hielo emprenden la caza. Después, la letal helada retrocede y los barcos salen a pescar con arpones, buscando sierpes marinas y krakens».
languages.original_text: {n}The giant's gaze thaws.{/n} "Fenris is home. A harsh land of harsh winters and harsh people. When comes the Helwinter, a fearsome season of frosts, the merciless Worldsea freezes and great white bears, snow wyrms, and ice trolls go on the hunt. Then the murderous frost retreats, and boats of harpooners sail out to ply their craft, capturing sea snakes and krakens."

Cuando llega el Invierno de Hela, el Mar del Mundo se congela y los grandes osos polares, las sierpes de las nieves y los trolls de hielo emprenden la caza. Después, la letal helada retrocede y los barcos salen a pescar con arpones, buscando sierpes marinas y krakens».

languages.text: {n}巨人の視線が和らぐ。{/n}「フェンリスは故郷だ。厳しい冬と厳しい人々の厳しい土地。ヘルウィンターと呼ばれる恐ろしい霜の季節がやってくると、無慈悲な大海も凍りつき、グレートホワイトベア、スノウウィルム、氷河巨人が狩りに出る。そして殺人的な霜が去ると、銛打ちの舟が出航し、シースネークやクラーケンを捕獲する」
languages.original_text: {n}The giant's gaze thaws.{/n} "Fenris is home. A harsh land of harsh winters and harsh people. When comes the Helwinter, a fearsome season of frosts, the merciless Worldsea freezes and great white bears, snow wyrms, and ice trolls go on the hunt. Then the murderous frost retreats, and boats of harpooners sail out to ply their craft, capturing sea snakes and krakens."

languages.text: {n}Der Blick des Riesen taut auf.{/n} "Fenris ist Heimat. Ein raues Land mit rauen Winter und rauen Bewohnern. Wenn der Helwinter kommt, eine furchterregende Jahreszeit des Frosts, friert die gnadenlose Weltsee ein und große weiße Bären, Schneewyrmer und Eistrolle gehen auf die Jagd. Dann zieht sich der mörderische Frost zurück und die Harpuniere fahren mit ihren Booten hinaus, um Seeschlangen und Kraken zu fangen."
languages.original_text: {n}The giant's gaze thaws.{/n} "Fenris is home. A harsh land of harsh winters and harsh people. When comes the Helwinter, a fearsome season of frosts, the merciless Worldsea freezes and great white bears, snow wyrms, and ice trolls go on the hunt. Then the murderous frost retreats, and boats of harpooners sail out to ply their craft, capturing sea snakes and krakens."

Dann zieht sich der mörderische Frost zurück und die Harpuniere fahren mit ihren Booten hinaus, um Seeschlangen und Kraken zu fangen."

languages.text: {n}Le regard du géant s'adoucit.{/n} « Fenris, c'est le foyer. Une terre rude, aux hivers rudes et aux individus qui le sont tout autant. Lorsqu'arrive l'Hiver Infernal, une saison glaciale et terrifiante, l'impitoyable Mer-Monde gèle et les grands ours blancs, les wyrms des neiges et les trolls des glaces partent à la chasse. Ensuite, le froid assassin se retire, et des bateaux de pêcheurs au harpon s'en vont capturer des serpents de mer et autres krakens. »
languages.original_text: {n}The giant's gaze thaws.{/n} "Fenris is home. A harsh land of harsh winters and harsh people. When comes the Helwinter, a fearsome season of frosts, the merciless Worldsea freezes and great white bears, snow wyrms, and ice trolls go on the hunt. Then the murderous frost retreats, and boats of harpooners sail out to ply their craft, capturing sea snakes and krakens."

Then the murderous frost retreats, and boats of harpooners sail out to ply their craft, capturing sea snakes and krakens."

languages.text: {n}Devin bakışları yumuşuyor.{/n} "Fenris yuvadır. Halkı sert, kışları çetin, sert bir diyardır. Korkunç don zamanı Acı Kış geldiğinde acımasız Dünyadeniz donar; büyük beyaz ayılar, kar ejderleri ve buz trolleri ava çıkar. Öldürücü soğuk çekildiğindeyse zıpkıncı tekneleri, su yılanı ve krakenleri yakalamak için denize açılır."
languages.original_text: {n}The giant's gaze thaws.{/n} "Fenris is home. A harsh land of harsh winters and harsh people. When comes the Helwinter, a fearsome season of frosts, the merciless Worldsea freezes and great white bears, snow wyrms, and ice trolls go on the hunt. Then the murderous frost retreats, and boats of harpooners sail out to ply their craft, capturing sea snakes and krakens."

traits.locale_text: {n}Devin bakışları yumuşuyor.{/n} "Fenris yuvadır. Sert bir halka ve sert kışlara sahip, sert bir diyardır. Korkunç don zamanı Acı Kış geldiğinde acımasız Dünyadeniz donar; büyük beyaz ayılar, kar wyrmleri ve buz trolleri ava çıkar. Daha sonra öldürücü soğuk çekildiğinde zıpkıncı tekneleri su yılanı ve krakenleri yakalamak için denize açılırlar."
